content: I am a Calculating age...year old boy from a town named "Malda" from West Bengal, India. I am currently a third year undergraduate student in Mathematics at Indian Statistical Institute, Bangalore. My interests are in Probability Theory, Stochastic Process, Statistical Inference.Apart from academics, I am great foodie! I love to eat, and like to cook as well. I am also fan of Bengali Rock Music, but I am quite inclined to other genre as well. I also like to play First Person Shooter games, carrom, antichess, badminton, and cards. I am really fond of cardistry, and I also like to play literature, poker, auction bridge, contract bridge and call break.I also like to read in my free time, especially thriller and detective stories, but I am heavily biased towards Bengali Story Books. But if you have book suggestions for me, feel free to drop an email. (But I would expect that at least an English or Hindi Copy of that book would be available!!).

title: Curriculum Vitae

content:
Fall 2025 #I am currently doing a reading project under the guidance of Professor Rishideep Roy on Fractal Percolation and Stochastic Geometry. I have worked in a project titled 3 Player Auction Bridge - Statistical Algorithmic Strategies . This is a joint work with Sourish Sarkar (ISI Bangalore), and Dr. Moutushi Chatterjee (ISI Bangalore) Summer 2025 #I have been selected as one of the research interns at IISER Kolkata. I am doing my research internship under Dr. Amit Ghoshal. The topic I am working on is Modelling Water Transport Channel in Aquifers using Bond Percolation.
I have worked in a project titled A New Three Players AUCTION BRIDGE With Dynamic Opponents and Team Members . This is a joint work with Sourish Sarkar (ISI Bangalore), and Dr. Moutushi Chatterjee (ISI Bangalore).
Fall 2024 #I have completed a reading project under Professor Supriyo Bhar on Discrete and Continuous Time Martingale.
